title: Design Basis for Technical Description - Greenfield

storage.value:
Design Basis

This technical description outlines the Activated Sludge (AS) alternative for the proj_name Project ID proj_id Water Resource Recovery Facility (WRRF) in proj_loc. As outlined below, the design capacity of the proposed facility is Q_inf_AA m3/d.

This document outlines the overview of the proposed treatment process, the basis of design and preliminary design information by process unit.

Table 1 and 2 show the influent flows and characteristics, as well as effluent limits used as the basis of design, which are based on the provided information and on certain assumptions made during the design.
